name: Reflection (V)
Lore: 'It was hard to imagine the enormous losses the Alliance suffered during the Battle of Hoth. Leia contemplated what she could do to help the Rebellion recover.',
Text: 'Deploy on [Endor] Leia. Leia''s training destiny draws are +1. During your control phase, may use 3 Force (if Save You It Can on table, may use 1 Force instead) to retrieve 1 Force (cannot be reduced).',
